metadata.feature_description: Insert emojis in posts and comments using emoji panel

steps.action: Navigate to Community page and click on post area
steps.expected: Post editor should open with emoji button visible
steps.actual: Post editor opened with emoji button visible in toolbar

steps.action: Click emoji button to open emoji panel
steps.expected: Emoji panel should open with emoji categories
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened showing People category with various emoji options

steps.action: Click on grinning face emoji to insert
steps.expected: Emoji should be inserted into post text
steps.actual: Grinning face emoji was inserted into post text area

steps.expected: Post should be created with emoji displayed
steps.actual: Post was successfully created and emoji displays correctly in the activity stream

steps.action: Create new post and open emoji panel

steps.actual: Both emojis were inserted into the post text

steps.expected: Post should display multiple emojis correctly
steps.actual: Post was created with both emojis (thumbsup and heart_eyes) displayed correctly

steps.action: Click Comment on an existing post to open comment area
steps.expected: Comment input area should appear with emoji button
steps.actual: Comment area appeared with emoji button available

steps.action: Open emoji panel and insert thumbsup emoji in comment
steps.expected: Emoji should be inserted in comment text
steps.actual: Thumbsup emoji was inserted into comment text

steps.expected: Comment should be posted with emoji displayed
steps.actual: Comment was successfully posted with thumbsup emoji displayed

steps.action: Open emoji panel and look for search functionality
steps.expected: Search input should be visible to filter emojis
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened but no search input is visible in the UI. Code inspection shows .actStr_emojiSearch input selector exists but element is hidden

issues: Search input exists in code but is not visible or accessible in the UI - feature appears to be disabled or hidden

steps.action: Open emoji panel and observe category icons at bottom
steps.expected: Category icons should be visible (People, Nature, Food, etc.)
steps.actual: Category icons visible at bottom of emoji panel showing: People, Nature, Food, Celebration, Activity, Travel, Objects

steps.expected: Emoji panel should switch to show Nature emojis
steps.actual: Panel successfully switched to Nature category showing plants, flowers, animals, weather emojis

steps.action: Enter Edit mode and access Activity Stream module settings
steps.expected: Module settings should include option to enable/disable emoji panel
steps.actual: Accessed module settings via Actions > Admin > Settings. The Activity Stream tab shows various settings but NO emoji panel enable/disable option is visible

issues: The AS_ShowEmojiPanel setting exists in code (Constants.cs) but is not exposed in the module settings UI. Cannot test enabling/disabling emoji panel through the admin interface.

observations: Code review shows emoji settings constants in Constants.cs (EmojiSettings class with ShowEmojiPanel, ShowEmojiPeopleCategory, etc.) but these are not exposed in the module settings UI (Settings.ascx)
Emoji search functionality selector (.actStr_emojiSearch input) exists in code but the element is hidden/not rendered in the UI
The 'Verify emoji display across browsers' scenario was not tested as only a single browser environment is available for this test session
Emoji panel uses EmojiOne library and integrates with Knockout.js for data binding (showEmojiPanel, isEmojiOpen observables)
